summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2018, for the improvement of East 78th Street and East 79th Street, each form 5th Avenue Northeast to 10th Avenue Northeast; 5th Avenue Northeast from East 77th Street to East 85th Street; and 8th Avenue Northeast from East 78th Street to East 79th Street; all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden crosswalks and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 20423 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
